Usage
=====

Learn how to use ppmx to manage your Python projects like a pro.

Basic commands:

- Creating a new virtual environment:
  
  .. code-block:: bash

     ppmx create myenv

- Installing packages:

  .. code-block:: bash

     ppmx install requests

- Removing packages:

  .. code-block:: bash

     ppmx remove requests

- Activating environments:

  .. code-block:: bash

     source myenv/bin/activate

Detailed usage instructions and options will be covered here.
